text: Abaffe temulaba nti mazima Katonda yabagondeza ebyo ebiri mu ggulu omusanvu n'ebyo ebiri mu nsi, era n'abawa mu bungi ebyengerabye eby'okungulu n'ebyomunda, naye mu bantu mulimu abawalaaza empaka ku bikwata ku Katonda awatali kusinziira ku kumanya kwonna wadde obulungamu wadde e kitabo ekibamulisiza e kkubo
